title: TaskFlow - Project Management App
description: A collaborative task management platform that helps teams plan, track, and deliver projects efficiently with real-time updates.

title: EduLearn - Online Learning Portal
description: A modern e-learning platform featuring video courses, quizzes, and student progress tracking.

title: HealthSync - Fitness Tracking Dashboard
description: A health monitoring dashboard that tracks workouts, calories, and daily activity with dynamic data visualization.

title: ShopEase - E-commerce Platform
description: A scalable online shopping application with product filtering, cart management, and secure checkout integration.

title: CodeNote - Developer Note Manager
description: A markdown-based note-taking application designed specifically for developers to organize snippets and documentation.
